pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group containing the Kusto cluster.

pathParameters.name: clusterName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Kusto cluster.
